title: A Bunch of Birkenstocks Are on Sale at Zappos
text:
16 items in this article 13 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the retailer

As we ride out the tail end of summer, you might want to stock up on a pair or two of Birkenstocks, a bunch of which are on sale up to 30 percent at Zappos. Whether you’re more of a classicist and prefer the leather Arizona style or want to try a rubber thong, there’s a Birk for everyone, in a range of fun colors from lilac to magenta to metallic blue. We especially like the adorable printed ones for kids.

Birkenstock Arizona - Electric Metallic Ocean $90 (was $100, now 10% off) $90 at Zappos Buy

Birkenstock Arizona - Electric Metallic Magenta $80 (was $100, now 20% off) $80 at Zappos Buy

Birkenstock Arizona - Electric Metallic Taupe $90 (was $100, now 10% off) $90 at Zappos Buy

Birkenstock Gizeh - Washed Metallic Aqua $88 (was $125, now 30% off) $88 at Zappos Buy

Birkenstock Gizeh - Washed Metallic Pink $88 (was $125, now 30% off) $88 at Zappos Buy

Birkenstock Arizona Big Buckle - Washed Metallic Blue $128 (was $160, now 20% off) $128 at Zappos Buy

Birkenstock Madrid Big Buckle - Washed Metallic Blue $118 (was $130, now 9% off) $118 at Zappos Buy

Birkenstock Gizeh - Scuba Blue EVA $36 (was $40, now 10% off) $36 at Zappos Buy

description: A bunch of Birkenstock sandals for women and kids are on sale at Zappos, including Arizona, Gizeh, Madrid, and other styles in a range of colors like blue, pink, natural leather, and more.
